00038 const String& OgreOggSoundFactory::getType(void) const

00042 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 MovableObject* OgreOggSoundFactory::createInstanceImpl( const String& name,
00044         const NameValuePairList* params)
00045 {
00046         String fileName;
00047         bool loop = false;
00048         bool stream = false;
00049         bool preBuffer = false;
00050 
00051         if (params != 0)
00052         {
00053                 NameValuePairList::const_iterator fileNameIterator = params->find("fileName");
00054                 if (fileNameIterator != params->end())
00055                 {
00056                         // Get fontname
00057                         fileName = fileNameIterator->second;
00058                 }
00059 
00060                 NameValuePairList::const_iterator loopIterator = params->find("loop");
00061                 if (loopIterator != params->end())
00062                 {
00063                         // Get fontname
00064                         loop = StringUtil::match(loopIterator->second,"true",false);
00065                 }
00066 
00067                 NameValuePairList::const_iterator streamIterator = params->find("stream");
00068                 if (streamIterator != params->end())
00069                 {
00070                         // Get fontname
00071                         stream = StringUtil::match(streamIterator->second,"true",false);
00072                 }
00073 
00074                 NameValuePairList::const_iterator preBufferIterator = params->find("preBuffer");
00075                 if (preBufferIterator != params->end())
00076                 {
00077                         // Get fontname
00078                         preBuffer = StringUtil::match(preBufferIterator->second,"true",false);
00079                 }
00080         }
00081 
00082         // when no caption is set
00083         if ( name == StringUtil::BLANK || fileName == StringUtil::BLANK )
00084         {
00085                 OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS,
00086                         "'name & fileName' parameter required when constructing an OgreOggISound.",
00087                         "OgreOggSoundFactory::createInstance");
00088         }
00089 
00090         return OgreOggSoundManager::getSingletonPtr()->createSound(name,fileName,stream,loop,preBuffer );
00091 
00092 }
00093 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00094 void OgreOggSoundFactory::destroyInstance( MovableObject* obj)
00095 {
00096         // destroy the sound
00097         OgreOggSoundManager::getSingletonPtr()->_releaseSoundImpl(static_cast<OgreOggISound*>(obj));
00098 }
